item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:Re: Lendermarket (Plattform von Creditstar) 1% Cashback 60 T @49186
item.description:
Oktaeder
So, die Haltefrist meiner letzten Bonusaktion ist abgelaufen, AIs sind gestoppt. Bereit mal wieder 10-20% abzuziehen, so das bald nur noch verdiente Zinsen dort stehen.
Die drei Monate haben mir inkl. Bonus rund 1000â‚¬ gebracht.
Es hat sich gelohnt, hier nicht in den chicken-mode zu wechseln.

item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:Re: Neues Produkt Mintos Smart Cash (Mintos) #mintos @Mintos #p2plending
item.description:

Zitat:
We want to inform you that the rate for Smart Cash has been changed to 2.25% effective immediately due to the recent ECB rate decrease.

item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:Re: Heavyfinance Erfahrungen (Land- und Baumaschinen Litauen
item.description:
Claus Lehmann
Umbenennung von Heavyfinance* in Insoil

Zitat:
We have exciting news to share with you â€” is now InSoil! ðŸŽ‰ This rebranding marks a new chapter for our company, one that reflects our deeper commitment to regenerative agriculture and soil health as the foundation of resilient food systems. The name InSoil embodies what we stand for - supporting farmers in their transition to regenerative practices, and unlocking both environmental and economic value through impact investing. ðŸš€ InSoil Finance â€“ our investor community is growing Over the past year, more than 14,000 investors have joined our platform. To better serve this growing community, weâ€™re introducing a dedicated investor identity: InSoil Finance. While our mission stays the same, InSoil Finance will ensure a clearer, more focused experience for retail investors like yours. As part of this evolution, weâ€™ve also updated our brand visuals and logo. You can find our full media kit here: ðŸ‘‰ InSoil Finance Media Kit We kindly ask you to update any mentions of on your platforms - including logos, brand name references, or visuals - to the new InSoil Finance branding, if possible. This ensures brand consistency and helps us present a unified message to the wider community. We truly appreciate your continued support and partnership. If you have any questions or need help with the update, feel free to reach out!

item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:Re: Twino Erfahrungen (Twino) #twino @twino_eu #p2plending
item.description:
Gollum
Zur Info, bei der neuen Cashback Aktion wurden wohl die Bedingungen geÃ¤ndert.
Zitat:
As the current campaign differs from the previous one and considers balance growth from new deposits, the symbol under My Investments â†’ Individual Investments no longer appears. This is because it would not be technically possible to ensure accurate visibilityâ€”if, for example, existing funds together with a new deposit (representing 30% of the investment) were allocated to the same security, the symbol would appear, but only 30% would actually qualify for cashback. To view the cashback payout amount, please go to Profile â†’ Campaigns â†’ Payout Info.


In den Terms and Conditions ist es noch ausfÃ¼hrlicher und umstÃ¤ndlicher erklÃ¤rt, aber im Prinzip zÃ¤hlt nur noch neu eingezahltes und investiertes Kapital fÃ¼r den Cashback

UAB Credit Consulting Services aka Prasiskolinau kennt man Ã¼brigens noch von Viventor. Ich meine mich zu erinnern, dass sie schon dort damals in 2020 - 2021 die Kredite nicht mehr zurÃ¼ckgezahlt haben.
